page.title: 19 YARDLEY CHASE
page.content: In the grassland area 120 flowering plant species have been recorded. The ponds have aquatic vegetation & many wetland plants with freshwater invertebrates, amphibia & reptiles. The woodland has plantations of differing age & composition. Species of animals:- 13 breeding dragonfly species(16 species have been observed) 27 species of butterfly(some uncommon elsewhere in the country) 20 species of mammals (including several types of bat) More than 70 species of bird have been recorded as either nesting or associatedd with the area. Other insect groups include moths, grasshoppers,& crickets;also uncommon species of beetle. Grid ref:SP850540 OS sheet 1:50,000 153 1:10,000 SP 85 SW
